alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 06 at 6:53PM MST until December 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow may significantly reduce visibility and cause partial lane blockages.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
